pullRequest.title: Added play and resume actions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Basically we now have Play and Resume buttons that work, but the way they work is ugly.
I think we may need to re-think the item types and model them into a class structure as on the server where they have a common inheritance root, before this can become prettier

commit.message: Added play and resume actions as well as app crashing dummies for the others

nodes.bodyText:
Might be worth splitting the user specific data to a separate class. Something like "Episode" and "UserEpisode". This way we can (in the future) cache episode data in the app when switching users.
Not necessary though
